content: waymaker cowl design by amanda massingill a waymaker provides a way means or solution despite difficulty or impossibility it one of the names given to god in the bible i don t know about you but there have been times in my life where i couldn t see past what was right in front of me i couldn t find a way but he did it s what he does while this cowl may take a bit of work on our part to knit the stitches provide a rhythm that allows us to relax and remember we don t have to have it all figured out if we would trust he will make a way even when we don t see one skill level advanced beginner materials yarn mandi s makings dk weight 75% superwash merino/ 25% nylon 245 yards/ 100 g 1 main color mc early riser 1 contrast color cc half past twelve circular knitting needles size u s 8 5 mm 32 cable yarn needle stitch marker blocking mat/ pins scissors copyright you may make and sell items using this pattern but please list me as the designer do not copy and paste this pattern and claim it as your own you may share photos of your finished pieces but please do not share photos of my finished pieces and claim them as your own www mandismakings com | ourmakings@gmail com | @mandismakings | #waymakercowl 1 waymaker cowl design by amanda massingill finished measurements blocked 24 circumference unstretched x 14 tall abbreviations mc = main color co = cast on cc = contrast color bobble = bind k = knit st s = stitch es p = purl pm = place marker repeat = repeat notes this pattern was created using a contrast color for the stripes but you can make it your own use mini skeins for the stripes hold fingering double for a marled look or make each section a new color the possibilities are endless use this pattern as a blank canvas and paint the masterpiece you are looking for gauge blocked 23 sts/ 26 row = 4 inches in pattern copyright you may make and sell items using this pattern but please list me as the designer do not copy and paste this pattern and claim it as your own you may share photos of your finished pieces but please do not share photos of my finished pieces and claim them as your own www mandismakings com | ourmakings@gmail com | @mandismakings | #waymakercowl 2 waymaker cowl design by amanda massingill instructions using mc using cc co 144 sts pm and join in the round being careful not to round 47-49 repeat row 11 twist your sts using mc round 1-10 k1 p1 round 50 - 59 repeat row 11 round 11 k3 p1 using cc round 12-20 repeat row 11 round 60-62 repeat row 11 using cc using mc round 21 - 23 repeat row 11 round 63-72 repeat row 11 using
